## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G08290](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G08290)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>YLS8</u>
- **Gene Name:** YELLOW-LEAF-SPECIFIC GENE 8
- **Description:**   mRNA splicing factor, thioredoxin-like U5 snRNP;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
